Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: Trying to find a lively bar with nice cocktails and good vibe/music: there comes Sous! Few cocktail options but the ones we selected were delicious! The crowd was exactly as I could wish for; late twenties and above. Upbeat music with some oldies in between. This can be the ‚Äúlocal‚Äù bar in town when I visit Amsterdam again ‚ò∫Ô∏è

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: Great location, cozy restaurant and good service. Wines were good. I felt a bit let down by the food though. All small plates but not very memorable. Nice for a casual dinner but for what we paid, I did expect a bit better.

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: The place is very cute, and the food is good. I‚Äôm putting only 4 stars for high prices for each dish (it function as tapas size portions).

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: What can I say.. When I arrived in the bar and I was waiting to see if they had a table for 3, the waiter didn‚Äôt even bother to come to me, he just waved at me saying no. There were some tables available, maybe reserved but still, you can tell the customer and not just wave. I‚Äôll never come back and therefore I won‚Äôt recommend.

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: The concept is to serve small portions, so you can order more. A little bit expensive, but it it worth it! The food was very delicious and the staff was friendly. Recommend!

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: One of my favorite eats in Amsterdam on our visit. I had this delicious pizza and my girlfriend had the panini. My goodness. And it was our FIRST meal...set a high bar. Great tunes, too, if I remember correctly.

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: Nice place, friendly staff, small creative plates, good wines. All there :)

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: Nice little find in the Nine Streets district. Cooking by real Italian chefs is imaginative and very tasty. Of course based on the trendy sharing concept. Food came quickly on a relatively quiet Wednesday night. Pizetta (small pizza) ‚Ä¶

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: Really nice food (pizza is really good). Also a cozy place for dining or a drink. The portion is a bit smaller but good for me.

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text:
My favorite bistro, bar, hangout.

Both with friends or business it's always a pleasure to enjoy great drinks, food ‚Ä¶

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: Great restaurant/bar with awesome "tapas" style dishes that are delicious. Good beer, nice selection of wine, and cool cocktails. Ravioli with pumpkin is amazing, saltin boca is delicious and pizza is really nice. The vibe is really hype

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: Where often service in Amsterdam isn't always top notch uptown, this place has super friendly staff, likes to have a little chat with you. The girl at the door was very welcoming and even when it was busier when we left, she still took the ‚Ä¶

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: The guys are very attentive. Always good service. Top tent.

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: Both foods and service are really good. We came in for a quick lunch and were nicely surprised how tasty everything were. My beet salad was amazing and I believe there are three different types of beets in there. The potato crust is a nice ‚Ä¶

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: Very friendly and easy-going staff. Music is not too loud. Free Wifi. Love the covered courtyard at the back with skylight. Sandwich was so beautiful that I didn‚Äôt want to eat it!

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: Fantastic. We were lucky enough to discover this place on their opening night a few weeks ago. We were looking for a place to eat and enjoyed great food in a lovely atmosphere. The menu is interesting and varied and the quality was excellent.

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: Overall a positive experience - good ravioli (if a bit watery) a nice fresh buratta and an a-bit-to-greasy melanzana (aubergine). Good wine selection, average desert (tiramisu - the sponge was rock hard). But a nice atmosphere and we had a great time.

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text:
Excellent. Great food, good atmosphere. Excellent service. Ribs, monkfish, eggplant, wine and chocolate brownie. They have only been open a week and ne of the best meals we have had in Europe.
Thank you Sous !!!

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: Attractive ambience and interesting selection of food lured me in. However, staff member was very unpleasant and downright rude. Simply unprofessional. Especially in a touristic place like Amsterdam more social sensitivity can be expected.

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: A must dine and wine venue! It's cosy, lively and very laid back all in one. This little hidden gem is located in the heart of Amsterdam and is perfect for any kind of occasion!

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: Pleasant space and ambiance, great menu with tasteful food. Nice place for a date or with friends.

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: Love this place, decent pricing .. great wine selections too

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: My local Amsterdam friend recommended this place. Great food, even a heart-shaped pizza for our vegan friends. Would recommend

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text:
Superb.
Cozy little gem! Great wine, tapas and service. The kind of place you want to find in a cold night in Amsterdam

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: They have very good Italian style pizzas! Fair prices and kind staff too üëç

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text:
Awesome place, cosy and nice atmosphere, great service! They have the best sandwich ever (puccia)!
And the cocktails are to die for!

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: A must go when in the nine streets. Great, relaxed place and people plus very good Italian bites from the open kitchen.

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: Very flavourful small dishes to share. Aubergine Parmiggiana is a must !

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: Really nice and pleasant place in Nine Street district.

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: I had the pasta with wild rabbit. The rabbit was good but I felt the pasta was undercooked. They were decent enough to not charge me for it.

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: Beautiful venue, food and coffee, worth a visit, enjoy!

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: Though below street level, the tasty bites and reasonably priced liquor did raise this bar ... above the expectation its humble name would suggest.

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: Delicious food & bites for affordable prices. Also some original wines like a Bulgarian Pinot Noir that was surprisingly nice

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: It's a nice place for a laid back dinner - food is delicious, prices are quite reasonable and the staff are nice

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: The food is delicious!! Nice and cozy place with friendly staff. Will definitely come back.

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: Lovely food and people. Our first taste of Dutch hospitality was outstanding.

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: Great place to sit down and relax!

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: The food was amazing! Atmosphere is a good vibe, prices are good.

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
Review Text: Cozy bistro, enjoyed the artichoke and pasta was cooked perfectly.  Staff was lovely.

Name: Sous Bar Bistro
